name: SchemaBCTest
description: Tests for backward compatibility of schema changes in OpenAPI specifications.

test_cases.name: unchanged
test_cases.description: Asserts that the specification remains unchanged.

test_cases.name: changedButCompatible
test_cases.description: Asserts that the specification has changed but remains compatible.

test_cases.name: discriminatorChanged
test_cases.description: Asserts that the discriminator change in the schema makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestFormatDecreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that a decrease in request format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestFormatIncreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that an increase in request format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: requestPropsPutIncreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that an increase in request properties for PUT operations makes the specification changed but compatible.

test_cases.name: responseFormatDecreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that a decrease in response format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: responseFormatIncreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that an increase in response format makes the specification backward incompatible.

test_cases.name: responsePropsRequiredDecreased
test_cases.description: Asserts that a decrease in required response properties makes the specification incompatible.

test_cases.name: typeChanged
test_cases.description: Asserts that a change in schema type makes the specification incompatible.
